hr.fer.zemris.java.hw10.jnotepadpp

Class Editor

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw10.jnotepadpp.Editor

  • public class Editor
extends Object
    Representation of single document, with it's text area and path.
    Author:
    petra

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Editor(JTextArea editor)
      Constructor takes text area, saves original document and sets path to null.
      Editor(Path path, JTextArea editor)
      Constructor takes text area, saves original document and sets path to the path of the opened document
